flavorText:
"While the sea may be our home, the sky is our destiny."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

foreignData.flavorText: „Die See mag unser Zuhause sein, aber der Himmel ist unsere Bestimmung." —Oberste Sprecherin Zegana
foreignData.name: Hydroform
foreignData.text: Ein Land deiner Wahl wird zu einer fliegenden 3/3 Elementarwesen-Kreatur bis zum Ende des Zuges. Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aunque el mar sea nuestro hogar, el cielo es nuestro destino."—Portavoz principal Zegana
foreignData.name: Hidroformar
foreignData.text: La tierra objetivo se convierte en una criatura Elemental 3/3 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: « La mer est peut-être notre foyer, mais notre destin est dans le ciel. » —Première oratrice Zegana
foreignData.name: Hydroforme
foreignData.text: Le terrain ciblé devient une créature 3/3 Élémental avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il mare è la nostra casa, ma il cielo è il nostro destino." —Portavoce Zegana
foreignData.name: Idroforma
foreignData.text: Una terra bersaglio diventa una creatura Elementale 3/3 con volare fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我々の故郷は海かもしれないが、進むべき先は空なのだ。」――首席議長ゼガーナ
foreignData.name: 水形
foreignData.text: 土地１つを対象とする。それはターン終了時まで飛行を持つ３/３のエレメンタル・クリーチャーになる。それは土地でもある。

foreignData.flavorText: "우리의 고향은 바다지만, 우리가 가야 할 곳은 하늘이다." —최고 의장 제가나
foreignData.name: 물의 형체
foreignData.text: 대지 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지는 턴종료까지 비행 능력을 가진 3/3 정령 생물이 된다. 그 대지는 생물이 된 후에도 여전히 대지다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Conquanto o mar possa ser o nosso lar, o céu é o nosso destino."— Oradora Principal Zegana
foreignData.name: Hidroformar
foreignData.text: O terreno alvo torna-se uma criatura do tipo Elemental 3/3 com voar até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Пусть наш дом — море, но наша судьба неразрывно связана с небесами». — Главный оратор Зегана
foreignData.name: Гидроформа
foreignData.text: Целевая земля становится существом 3/3 Элементаль с Полетом до конца хода. При этом она остается землей.

foreignData.flavorText: 「海是我们的家，天空则是我们的归宿。」 ～首席洁加娜
foreignData.name: 水化咒
foreignData.text: 目标地成为3/3，具飞行异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

foreignData.flavorText: 「海是我們的家，天空則是我們的歸宿。」 ～首席潔加娜
foreignData.name: 水化咒
foreignData.text: 目標地成為3/3，具飛行異能的元素生物直到回合結束。它依然是地。

name: Hydroform
originalText: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: If the target land hasn’t been under its controller’s control continuously since the beginning of their most recent turn, that land won’t be able to attack and its {T} abilities won’t be able to be activated. In most cases, that means it will no longer be able to be tapped for mana that turn.
Hydroform doesn’t affect the land’s name or any other types, subtypes, or supertypes (such as basic or legendary) the land may have. The land will also keep any abilities it had.

Effects that modify power and/or toughness but don’t set them to a specific value (like the one created by Giant Growth), power/toughness changes from counters, and effects that switch a creature’s power and toughness will continue to apply. This may happen if the land was already a creature when Hydroform resolved.

text: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
